author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons were arrested on the charges of assaulting a woman here on Sunday.

According to police, the woman Logeswari of Maramangalathupatti in Steel Plant area was attacked when her sister Sowmya (22) eloped with Kalimuthu (25) of the same area and got married two days ago. Angered by it, Kalimuthu’s brother Vijay (20) along with his friends Ezhumalai (22) and Kannan (29) went to Logeswari’s house and assaulted her. She suffered injuries and was hospitalised. Based on her complaint, the Steel Plant police registered a case under Sections 294 b(uttering obscene words in public place), 323 (voluntarily causing hurt), 324 (voluntarily causing hurt with dangerous weapons) of IPC and Section 4 of Tamil Nadu Prohibition of Women Harassment Act. The three were lodged at Salem Central Prison.
title: Three held for assaulting woman
